question: You have recently landed in a foreign country on a work visa and need information about the place in and around the city. Write a letter to the relocation assistance provider seeking help and in your letter,Write why you are writing the letterWhat kind of information you wantHow and by when you can get the requested information
text: I, Kuljeet Kaur, resided at Frank Hamburg Street from last week, writing this letter to you to seek help from you about the basic amenities present in the city.

I am unaware of the facilities present due to the fact that I have recently landed in this nation on a work visa. Therefore, I want to know the place in and around the city as I do not know any person here which makes me unable to understand the complex structure of this place. Because of that, I want to get the desired information in order to survive in this country.

Firstly, I want information about the medical facilities provided on this street as well as I also want to know the exact location of the hospitals. In addition to it, I need to know other fundamental things required such as where to get better opportunities for financial aid as well as investment.

This piece of information is very mandatory for me and I want to get it by next week. So, I want you to please furnish this data to me at the earliest so that I can manage and handle my tasks easily and on time.
Looking forward to hearing from your side.
